channel.title: Games on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Games on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Resident Evil - Text Adventure
item.description: If you have played and completed Without Escape, you may have seen in the extras section an option called Background where I explain where the idea of making the game initially came from.

item.title: Intuitive Hangman
item.description: This version of the classic Hangman has been designed to be as intuitive as possible.

item.title: Flappy Birdemic
item.description: Flappy Birdemic is a clone of Flappy Bird based on the movie Birdemic for Android devices.

item.title: Stars End
item.description: Stars End is a multiplayer sci-fi survival game set hundreds of years in the future, in a star system colonized by humans escaping their dying home world.

item.title: Mars: Chaos Menace
item.description: We are in the Terraforming age after saving our homeworld, Earth, which was collapsed by radioactive contamination and the depletion of resources.

item.title: Demon's Crystals
item.description: Demon’s Crystals is a frenetic twin stick shooter where you guide the Urican demons through countless hazards in order to restore peace to the world.

item.title: City Gardener
item.description: This is a small prototype I did in three days for a game jam, the Ludum Dare 42.

item.title: Without Escape
item.description: Without Escape harkens back to first-person graphic adventures of the early ‘90s, which relied on pre-rendered backgrounds and full-motion video to tell interactive stories.

item.title: SuperPong! (Nintendo DS Homebrew)
item.description: SuperPong! Is the first game I did for consoles. I started developing it for GameCube. Then I ported it to GameBoy Advance adding some features, and finally I did the definitive version for Nintendo DS.

item.title: Without Escape (Nintendo DS Homebrew)
item.description: It is a graphic adventure for Nintendo DS that mixes some touches of Resident Evil and Silent Hill. In the game you wake up because you hear some strange noises, so you decide to investigate.
